name: Scale for Body Weight, High Accuracy Bathroom Digital Scales, Bluetooth Weighing Scale, Unlimited Users, LCD Display, Round Corner Disign, Compact Size with Sturdy Tempered Glass 400lb- White
about_this_item: Extra Wide LCD Scale: Made of durable tempered glass, this scale features a large 10.2" x 10.2" platform for big feet or those with balance issues. The LCD display with large, backlit numbers is easy to read, even in the dark.

High Accuracy Scales: Equipped with 4 precision sensors, our scales provide accurate weight measurements (0.22lb-400lb/0.1-181kg) on a clear display. Features auto-connection, recognition, and ON/OFF. Use on a flat surface for best results.

Bluetooth 5.0 Digital Scale: Scan the QR code or free download the Ikeeping) at APP store or Google Play, Weight scales work in connection with fitness apps, simple and easy step to a healthier lifestyle.(3 x 1.5V AAA batteries include)

5mm Slim & Durable: MPBEKING scales feature a shatter-resistant, round-corner design for safety. Anti-slip pads ensure stability, while tempered glass with smoothed edges protects your feet. For accuracy, use on hard, even floors

One Scale, Unlimited Users: Share the scale with family or friends to track metrics like BMI. MPBEKING offers a 30-day refund/replacement, 24-month guarantee, and 24-hour customer service for any issues.

title: Very useful
content: I bought it specifically to weigh a kitten - I should have read through the description more thoroughly. It makes it sound as though it does something special when you set it to the 'baby' setting - but all it really does is holds on to your weight and then deducts that from the total weight when you pick up the pet/baby. I can do that in my head pretty easily with my regular scale. I thought it might set it to a more sensitive setting, but it turns out it's not accurate at all below 13 lb, so not suitable for my purposes.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I joined a program for weight loss and they gave me a free scale.  No matter where I set that scale I got a different weight and it was never accurate.  So I needed a new one that was accurate.  I read all reviews and chose this one.  As soon as you set this scale down, it calibrates and gives you a C to let you know it's ready.  No matter where I set this scale it give me the same weight, so I know it's accurate.  As you know when you are trying to monitor your weight for health reasons or weight management,  having an accurate scale is important.  And the price is great too.  Would recommend this scale to anyone looking for a good accurate scale.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
